nodes.bodyText: Why do we need these changes? (and other similar)

Earlier, with table type-checking the constraint was not considered. Thus, it was possible to assign a value of type table<record {}> (or some table broader than table<Foo>) to a variable of table<Foo> (as mentioned in #17808).
This PR fixes the type-checking bug, which requires this change to accept a result of a db client remote method.
